tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Coaches (
 coach_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 coach_name VARCHAR(50),
 training_plan TEXT,
 workout_log TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE TrainingPlans (
  plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  coach_id INT,
  plan_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (coach_id) REFERENCES Coaches(coach_id)
);

CREATE TABLE coach (coach_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
coach_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
creation_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE training_plan (plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
coach_id INT REFERENCES coach(coach_id),
plan_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
start_date DATE,
end_date DATE)

CREATE TABLE workout_log (log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
plan_id INT REFERENCES training_plan(plan_id),
log_date DATE NOT NULL,
workout_description TEXT)

CREATE TABLE WorkoutDetails (
  detail_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  log_id INT REFERENCES WorkoutLogs(log_id),
  exercise_id INT REFERENCES Exercises(exercise_id),
  sets INT,
  reps INT
);
